    Processing global data in R An Example ELSA Workflow

    Processing global data in R

    data-info.Rmd
    library(elsar)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
    Dataset Dataset Name R Function Function Specifics Comments Tested
    Certified Forests NA (deprecated) NA NA NA NA
    Crop Suitability Difference overall_cropsuit_i_diff_19812010_20712100 make_normalised_raster() inverse = TRUE OG code: all vals > 0 = 0; vals = -vals Y
    Drought Risk gDH19_oct2015 make_normalised_raster() default none Y
    Flood Risk flood_risk_opportunities_global make_normalised_raster() default none Y
    Forest Integrity Index flii_earth-001_cog, global_fsii_2023 make_forest_integrity() NA OG code: all vals < 0 = 0 Y
    Intact Wilderness Area NA make_normalised_raster() default none N
    Irrecoverable Carbon NA make_normalised_raster() default OG code: all vals < 0 = 0 N
    Live Biomass Carbon NA make_normalised_raster() default OG code: all vals < 0 = 0 N
    Vulnerable Soil Organic Carbon Difference soc-at-risk-V11 make_normalised_raster() default none Y
    Threatened Species Richness NA make_normalised_raster() default none N
    Urban Extreme Heat NA make_urban_extreme_heat() NA NA N
    Velocity of Climate Change NA make_normalised_raster() default none N
    WAD convergence evidence wad_final_cog make_normalised_raster() default none Y
    Yield Gap NA make_normalised_raster() NA 100 - vals N
    Landcover Layers NA make_landcover_layers() NA NA N
    Landmark Areas NA make_normalised_raster() with addition NA NA N
    Key Biodiversity Areas NA make_kbas() NA NA N
    Managed Forests FML_v3.2_near_cog make_managed_forests() default predefined categories: 11: undisturbed forest (NOT managed), 20: disturbed forest (can be considered managed), rest (31, 32, 40, 53): managed (palm oil, etc.) Y
    Mangroves gmw_v3_2020_vec make_mangroves() default NA Y
    Mountains/Glaciers NA make_mountains_glaciers() NA NA N
    Existing PAs Pulled from wdpar package make_protected_areas() default buffer_points = TRUE needed when “POINT” information exists in geometry Y
    Productive Managed Forests NA make_productive_managed_forests() NA NA N
    Threatened Ecosystems NA (TBA at a later date) make_threatened_ecosystems() NA NA N
    Underepresented Ecosystems NA make_underepresented_ecosystems() NA NA N
    Urban Greening Zones NA make_urban_greening_zones() NA NA N
    Ramsar Wetlands NA make_ramsar_wetlands() NA NA N
